#T_SP=webanno.custom.Referent|entity|infstat
#T_RL=webanno.custom.Coref|type|BT_webanno.custom.Referent
#Text=Manage Home Stress
#Text=Being a Working Parent
#Text=In this era , almost both the parents are working .
#Text=They may find little time to spend with the family .
#Text=With the following tips , you can try to maximize what little time you have and make the family time memorable and positive by reducing stress .
#Text=Being in stress is natural for all human beings .
#Text=Life is not about being happy all the times .
#Text=All emotions are good and valid .
#Text=But when you raise the level of happiness above all , it reduces stress .
#Text=Steps
#Text=Parents and children both go through stress at every stage of life .
#Text=Stress creates emotional , physical and conduct problems .
#Text=These tips could help you reduce stress at home and increase fun time with your family .
#Text=Prepare a schedule to use your time and energy more wisely with the family .
#Text=Fun time must be included in the schedule .
#Text=Family discussions should be regular .
#Text=Discuss not only the problems , issues or any conflicts but also the happy moments and family goals .
#Text=Try to do family activities together such as , play together or exercise together .
#Text=Spend time with each child every day even if it is of shorter duration .
#Text=Make a family calendar to mark the special occasions , meetings , appointments or outings .
#Text=It will help to avoid time conflicts .
#Text=Spend alone time with your spouse .
#Text=It reduces distractions and creates a happy environment in the home .
#Text=Defining Basic House Rules
#Text=All the family members should define the basic house rules and agree to prevent conflicts later .
#Text=Having meals at particular time and children going to bed at a certain time .
#Text=Doing the dishes on time and not leaving them anywhere .
#Text=Taking care of siblings when parents are away .
#Text=Being responsible for your things and be organized .
#Text=Calling home to tell the family if you are coming late from the usual time .
#Text=Workload Sharing
#Text=All the chores should be done by sharing the workload .
#Text=Avoid workload on a single family member .
#Text=Specific tasks should be allotted to each family member .
#Text=Let them choose what they can do .
#Text=Give age-appropriate chores to children .
#Text=Being responsible at an early age helps to build self-esteem .
#Text=Eating Together
#Text=Spending meal times together is a blessing .
#Text=A family which eats together stays together .
#Text=Use meal times to share the happenings of the day .
#Text=Train children to help in preparing the meals .
#Text=Plan your meals before .
#Text=Decide and buy the ingredients together .
#Text=Call home if any of the family members are unable to come for the meal or occupied .
#Text=Managing Family Illness
#Text=Get regular health check-ups for all the family members .
#Text=Be aware of the medical condition of each family member to reduce the stress to manage sudden illness .
#Text=Know the symptoms to avoid panic .
#Text=If any member is on medication , ensure to have the regular supply of medicines .
#Text=Mediate .
#Text=It will help your relax and calm down .
